context: does this cable fit the black slim xbox 360... need help ??

context: How many GBs is this console?
response: It's the "Deluxe Edition" so it's a 32 GB flash storage. You can always plug in an external drive up to two terabytes in size. make sure the drive is empty though.

context: As a mom I am asking... My son is 11. He has a couple of the call of duty games.  What do you think?  Can he avoid the sex stuff in "free roam"?
response: My kids (10 and 12) report that there is some nudity in one of the Watchdog missions, but it is easy to avoid that mission. So I guess the nudity is quite limited.  Hope that helps!  Who knew?

context: Does this controller work well with call of duty games
response: Hi! Sorry it took so long to reply, I asked my boyfriend and he said yes, he loves this controller.  He said its a hybrid  between an xbox and ps3 controller but he said it's easier to control it just takes some getting used to at first. Hope that helps!

context: Can this be played offline once downloaded?
response: Yes, I play it offline all the time.

context: can this play original xbox games
response: Certain original Xbox games will play on the 360, but most will not. However, the graphics are so much better on the 360 and it has by far outlasted our original Xbox.

context: is there a headset included
response: If bought new, yes a headset is included. If bought used, you will need to check that sellers particulsr listing to see if the headset is included.  If it is not specifically stated that it is, it is likely not included in a used sale.
